definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to revive old dreams (idiom); to relive past experiences

sentences.english: The old dreams or good dreams , they didn't work but we had them.
sentences.chinese: 旧梦与新梦，虽然没能实现，但我们曾经梦过。

sentences.english: My thoughts still cling to the moldering Past.
sentences.chinese: 我的思绪依然牵挂着前尘旧梦。

sentences.english: Bibo shake shadow dream hunt, chase trendy brothel visitors.
sentences.chinese: 碧波摇影寻旧梦，青楼游客追新潮。

sentences.english: To re-invent old dream consideration often we can not afford to pay.
sentences.chinese: 重寻旧梦的代价往往是我们付不起的。

sentences.english: The old dreams or good dreams, they didn't work out but I had them.
sentences.chinese: 旧梦与新梦，虽然没能实现，但我曾经梦过。

sentences.english: Can't repeat the past?" he cried incredulously."
sentences.chinese: “不能重温旧梦？”他大不以为然地喊到。

sentences.english: If two people mean to be together, eventually they will find their way back.
sentences.chinese: 如果两个人注定在一起最终他们会找到重温旧梦的路。

sentences.english: And the cost of re-old dreams often find that we can not afford to pay.
sentences.chinese: 而重寻旧梦的代价往往是我们付不起的。

sentences.english: I am reliving moments, This is just residual grief.
sentences.chinese: 我只是重温旧梦，这只是对你的怀念。

sentences.english: I just want to feel like that again, year after year.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望旧梦重温，每年都拿冠军。

sentences.english: Very difficult again, wonderful moment in life, don't go to dream, that ends it.
sentences.chinese: 良辰难再，人生中大好时刻，不要再去旧梦重圆。

sentences.english: Jiumeng re-find the price we often can not afford to pay.
sentences.chinese: 重寻旧梦的代价往往是我们付不起的。

sentences.english: Let old dreams fade into the night , so new ones can rise with dawn.
sentences.chinese: 让旧梦随夜幕退去，这样新梦就随黎明升起。

sentences.english: I remember the time I knew what happiness was, let the memory live again.
sentences.chinese: 我忘不了那一刻甜蜜幸福时辰，愿那旧梦再重温。

definition: the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
the past is vanished like the wind; gone beyond recall
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
